contentrichtext.text: The term '''Königstein''' ({{IPA-de|ˈkøːnikʃtaɪn}}) can refer to several places in Germany and Namibia: ; Germany: * [[Königstein im Taunus]], town in Hesse * [[Königstein, Saxony]] ** [[Festung Königstein]], castle near Königstein in Saxony * [[Königstein, Bavaria]] * [[Königstein (Westerhausen)]], hill near Westerhausen, Saxony-Anhalt ; Namibia: * [[Königstein, Namibia]], highest mountain in Namibia {{DEFAULTSORT:Koenigstein}} {{geodis}} [[Category:German toponyms]]
